summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-1 is implemented with a progressive speed multiplier that affects bird velocity and pipe speed, increasing every 10 seconds. REQ-2 is implemented with a visual speed indicator and temporary speed-up notifications. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.

hallucinated_features.description: Speed multiplier also affects pipe movement speed in addition to bird velocity
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 specifically requests bird vertical velocity increases, but the implementation also multiplies pipe speed (PIPE_SPEED * speedMultiplierRef.current). This extends beyond the stated requirement which focuses on bird velocity only.

hallucinated_features.description: Game over screen displays maximum speed reached
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify showing max speed on game over screen. This is an added feature not requested in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Speed multiplier capped at maximum value (MAX_SPEED_MULTIPLIER = 2.5)
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirement states speed increases gradually over time but does not specify a maximum cap. The implementation adds this constraint which was not requested.
